pr_title: Support subquery in FROM clause in new engine

timeline.message: skipped a broken test in SubqueryIT.java due to different schema in new engine

timeline.bodyText: Since alias is not optional in ANTLR grammar, is this check necessary?
timeline.author: dai-chen

replies.bodyText: forgot to remove this after changing the antlr grammar. Will remove it, thanks!
replies.author: chloe-zh

timeline.bodyText: Since we can support subquery now, do we need to pop up context somewhere?
timeline.author: dai-chen

replies.bodyText: Just took another look, so context is pushed first when visit RelationSubquery, should we do analyzer recursion before this? In this way, symbol defined by outer won't be accessible to inner, ex. select ... from (select ... from B) as A, is A accessible when visit subquery B?
replies.author: dai-chen

timeline.author: dai-chen

timeline.message: put the context push after subquery analysis recursion
